item.title: 泰国称美国关税谈判在截止日期前 "进展顺利
item.description: 泰国财政部长披差-春哈瓦吉拉（Pichai Chunhavajira）表示，泰国与美国就互惠关税问题举行的首次部长级会谈进展顺利。【原文：Thailand’s first ministerial-level talks with the US about reciprocal tariffs went well, according to Finance Minister Pichai Chunhavajira, adding that an improved proposal is in the works as the Southeast Asian nation seeks a deal before the deadline next week.】

item.title: 嘻哈音乐剧颠覆硅谷创始人刻板印象
item.description: 欢迎收看《深度科技》（Tech In Depth），这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，Ellen Huet 报道一部音乐剧，该剧为硅谷初创企业创始人的神话注入了新的色彩。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Ellen Huet reports on a musical that puts a new spin on the myth of the Silicon Valley startup founder.】

item.title: 希腊财政恐怖秀已成为遥远的回忆
item.description: 我是克雷格-斯特林，法兰克福资深编辑。今天我们将关注维多利亚-登德里努（Viktoria Dendrinou）、索蒂里斯-尼卡斯（Sotiris Nikas）和保罗-塔格韦尔（Paul Tugwell）关于希腊的报道。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您尚未注册接收本新闻通讯，请点击此处。【原文：I’m Craig Stirling , a senior editor in Frankfurt. item.title: 碧桂园 6 月销售下滑加剧，前景黯淡
item.description: 由于缺乏政策支持抑制了需求，碧桂园控股有限公司 6 月份的销售额再次下滑，该开发商的表现逊于同行。【原文：Country Garden Holdings Co.’s sales slid again in June, with the developer faring worse than peers, as a lack of policy support dampened demand.】

item.title: 据说CVC支持的FineToday将考虑重启东京IPO计划
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，FineToday 控股公司正在考虑重新启动在东京首次公开募股的计划，这家日本个人护理用品公司去年取消了此前的上市计划。【原文：FineToday Holdings Co. is considering reviving plans for an initial public offering in Tokyo, people familiar with the matter said, after the Japanese personal-care business canceled a previous attempt last year.】

item.title: 摩根大通任命欧洲股票资本市场新负责人
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. has appointed a slew of new leaders for its equity capital markets business in Europe, the Middle East and Africa, including Virginie de Grivel Nigam as head of execution for the region.】

item.title: 法国工业部长称 10%的关税对欧盟不利
item.description: 法国工业部长马克-费拉齐（Marc Ferracci）表示，同意对欧洲出口到美国的产品征收10%的关税将是一笔糟糕的交易，这表明他不赞成与华盛顿可能达成的妥协。【原文：French Industry Minister Marc Ferracci said agreeing to 10% tariffs on European exports to the US would be a bad deal, signaling disapproval of a potential compromise with Washington.】

item.title: Frasers 告诉雨果博斯不批准分红
item.description: Frasers Group Plc 警告 Hugo Boss AG，它将投票反对任何分红，因为这家由亿万富翁迈克-阿什利（Mike Ashley）拥有的英国零售商多年来一直在这家德国时装公司持股，并在此基础上施加影响。【原文：Frasers Group Plc warned Hugo Boss AG it will vote against any dividends, as the British retailer owned by billionaire Mike Ashley exerts its influence after years of building a stake in the German fashion house.】

item.title: 通胀预期消失推动南非债券反弹
item.description: 通胀预期的下降使南非政府债券的涨势有望延续，基准收益率已经跌至五年来的低点。【原文：Dwindling inflation expectations are setting South African government bonds up to extend a rally that’s already taken benchmark yields to five-year lows.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利将任命埃斯特维为欧洲、中东和非洲地区股票辛迪加主管
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，摩根士丹利已任命哈维尔-埃斯特维（Javier Esteve）为欧洲、中东和非洲股票银团负责人。【原文：Morgan Stanley has appointed Javier Esteve as head of equity syndicate for Europe, the Middle East and Africa, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 维勒鲁瓦称，若欧元持续走强，欧洲央行面临 2% 脱欧风险
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）表示，汇率大幅升值后，欧洲中央银行面临通胀目标未达标的更大风险。【原文：The European Central Bank is at greater risk of undershooting its inflation target following a sharp appreciation of the exchange rate, Governing Council member Francois Villeroy de Galhau said.】

item.title: 瑞银、花旗等银行在新加坡洗钱丑闻中受到处罚
item.description: 新加坡对九家金融公司处以 2,750 万新元（2,150 万美元）的罚款，其中包括几家世界最大的银行，原因是它们在该市最大的洗钱案中存在过失。【原文：Singapore imposed S$27.5 million ($21.5 million) in penalties on nine financial firms, including a few of the world’s biggest banks, for lapses related to the city’s largest money laundering case.】

item.title: 德国商业银行计划出售与 20 亿欧元贷款相关的 SRT
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，德国商业银行股份公司计划出售一项与企业贷款组合相关的重大风险转移，因为这家德国贷款机构正着手释放资本，以抵御意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）的潜在收购要约。【原文：Commerzbank AG plans to sell a significant risk transfer tied to a portfolio of corporate loans, according to people familiar with the matter, as the German lender moves to free up capital to fend off a potential takeover bid from UniCredit SpA.】

item.title: 英国广播公司的 "老妇人 "大楼将迎来 80 年来最大的一次改造
item.description: 英格兰银行历史悠久的伦敦办事处正准备进行二战以来最大规模的改造。【原文：The Bank of England’s historic London office is preparing for its biggest make-over since World War II.】

item.title: 经济放缓，多伦多房价连续第七个月下跌
item.description: 由于美国关税的影响导致加拿大经济放缓，多伦多的房价连续第七个月下跌。【原文：Home prices in Toronto fell for a seventh consecutive month as fallout from US tariffs caused Canada’s economy to slow.】

item.title: 路易威登韩国遭遇网络攻击，客户数据泄露
item.description: 路易威登韩国公司遭受网络攻击，部分客户数据被泄露，这是近几个月来黑客第二次攻击这个全球最大的奢侈品集团。【原文：Louis Vuitton Korea suffered a cyberattack that compromised some customer data, the second time in recent months that hackers have targeted the world’s largest luxury group.】

item.title: 日产退出印度市场后，雷诺寻求与 JSW 合作
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，雷诺汽车公司正在印度寻找合作伙伴，以加强其在印度的影响力，因为这家法国汽车制造商正在淡化与日产汽车公司的长期联盟关系。【原文：Renault SA is seeking a partner in India, according to people familiar with the matter, to strengthen its presence as the French automaker dilutes a long-term alliance with Nissan Motor Co.】

item.title: 英国建筑商以科维德事件以来最快速度减少商业工程量
item.description: 一项备受关注的调查显示，在经济形势严峻、投资支出减少的背景下，英国商业建筑活动出现了五年多来的最大降幅。【原文：UK commercial building activity dropped at the sharpest rate in over five years amid a challenging economic backdrop and lower investment spending, according to a closely watched survey.】

item.title: 通用大西洋公司正在探索乔& 果汁公司在美国的首次公开募股
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，General Atlantic 正在探索最快于明年在美国首次公开发行 Joe & the Juice 的可能性。【原文：General Atlantic is exploring a potential US initial public offering of Joe & the Juice as soon as next year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印度保险公司要求监管机构修订债券估值规则
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度保险公司已要求其监管机构修改债券估值规范，此举可能会鼓励更多公司参与企业债务市场。【原文：Indian insurers have asked their regulator to revamp bond valuation norms, according to people familiar with the matter, a move that could encourage greater participation in the corporate debt market.】

item.title: 欧佩克+将会议移至周六，考虑再次加息
item.description: 欧佩克+"主要成员国提前到周六召开在线会议，代表们表示，他们将考虑第四次大幅增产石油。【原文：Key OPEC+ members brought forward to Saturday an online meeting where they’re set to consider a fourth bumper oil production increase, delegates said.】

item.title: 美国银行称，美国 500 指数离触发卖出信号仅一步之遥
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）的迈克尔-哈特内特（Michael Hartnett）认为，标准普尔500指数（S&P 500）创下历史新高，使其离卖出信号近在咫尺。【原文：The S&P 500’s rally to record highs has brought it within striking distance of a sell signal, according to Bank of America Corp.’s Michael Hartnett.】

item.title: 日本物价专家称通胀率超出日本央行预期
item.description: 日本一位主要通胀专家表示，日本的通胀出人意料地强劲，这增加了日本央行在年底前提高利率的可能性。【原文：Japan’s inflation is surprisingly strong, increasing the possibility that the Bank of Japan will raise its interest rate by the end of the year, according to one of the country’s leading inflation experts.】

item.title: 奇货可居：纳西姆-塔勒布谈如何过上美好生活（播客）
item.description: 每天，我们都会被各种看似不可思议的头条新闻淹没。多场大规模战争仍在继续。政治反复无常。市场搅乱了每个人的大脑。那么，我们应该如何生活并感觉良好？我们应该如何看待我们周围的世界，以及各种可感知的风险。在上个月于纽约举行的 "奇货可居 "特别节目直播中，我们采访了著名作家纳西姆-尼古拉斯-塔勒布（Nassim Nicholas Taleb），他是 Universa 投资公司的科学顾问。【原文：Every day we’re inundated with headlines that are seemingly unbelievable. Multiple major wars are ongoing. Politics is erratic. Markets are scrambling everyone’s brains. So how should we live and feel good? How should we think about the world around us, and the various perceived risks out there. In yet another episode from our live Odd Lots special in New York City last month, we speak with famed author Nassim Nicholas Taleb, the scientific adviser at Universa Investments, who shares his perspec】

item.title: 全球基金在关税最后期限到来前的狂野之旅
item.description: 随着美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税最后期限临近，亚洲投资者正准备迎接一系列官方声明和社交媒体帖子。【原文：Asian investors are bracing for a flurry of official statements and social media posts as US President Donald Trump’s tariff deadline approaches.】

item.title: 土耳其榛子丰收受霜冻影响，果仁巧克力粉丝准备支付更多费用
item.description: 先是橄榄油，然后是可可和咖啡。现在，新的供应挤压又将冲击另一种美食享受--用于制作巧克力味 Nutella 涂抹酱的榛子。【原文：First olive oil, then cocoa and coffee. Now a fresh supply squeeze is set to hit another food pleasure — the hazelnuts that go into making the chocolaty Nutella spread.】

item.title: 中国主电网认为可再生能源将减少停电几率
item.description: 中国最大电网运营商的研究机构称，中国创纪录的可再生能源建设可能有助于电网克服天气导致的需求高峰。【原文：China’s record buildout of renewables may help networks overcome weather-driven demand spikes, according to the research arm of the country’s biggest grid operator.】

item.title: 在新欧洲债券等级体系中，法国收益率超过意大利
item.description: 持续存在的政治风险已将法国五年期债券推向欧元区最高收益率的边缘，现在人们的注意力正转向十年期债券的利率多快也会出现同样的情况。【原文：Lingering political risks have pushed French five-year bonds to the brink of becoming the highest-yielding in the euro region, and attention is now turning to how soon the rates on 10-year securities will do the same.】
